---
id: get-tag
title: "Get tag"
description: "This endpoint retrieves a tag for a given property id. The tag is identified by its unique identifier within the specified space. The response includes the tag's details such as its ID, name, and color. This is useful for clients to display or when editing a specific tag option."
sidebar_label: "Get tag"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-05-20/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/spaces/{space_id}/properties/{property_id}/tags/{tag_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves a tag for a given property id. The tag is identified by its unique identifier within the specified space. The response includes the tag's details such as its ID, name, and color. This is useful for clients to display or when editing a specific tag option.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>

</RequestSchema>
